meanings.definition: An action taken in response to a previous action.
meanings.sent1: After the argument, there were many counterreactions from both sides.
meanings.sent2: The counterreactions to the new policy were swift and varied.
meanings.sent3: The counterreactions to the prank were unexpected but amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a counterreaction to his hostility.
meanings.sent5: The counterreactions in the courtroom made the case more complicated.

meanings.definition: A response that opposes or neutralizes an initial reaction.
meanings.sent1: The medication caused unexpected counterreactions in the patient.
meanings.sent2: His calm demeanor was a counterreaction to her excitement.
meanings.sent3: The counterreactions to the spicy food were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a counterreaction to his frown.
meanings.sent5: The counterreactions to the proposal were met with skepticism.
